Name: Possession Obsession
About the game: Possession Obsession is a 2-4 player local multiplayer party game. As interns, you and your friends will compete for a coveted position at the infamous HELLC. Utilize your demonic powers and possess mortals to complete the boss's tasks in any way possible. MOUNDS OF MORTALS TO POSSESS! Possess mortals at any time! Gain special abilities from whomever you possess to help you complete the HELLC's tasks and impede the progress of your fellow interns. 4 DIFFERENT DEMONIC CLASSES Make use of 4 unique classes to crush the competition. Each class has access to 2 abilities in demon form and another when possession a mortal. FRIENDSHIP RUINING TASKS TO FIGHT OVER! Fight over the many tasks the HELLC assigns to be the intern that gets the job!
